comments:
I introduced a compilation error to a method which triggered an HCR, and got 
the following exception:

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: Array index out of range: 0
	at org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.core.hcr.MethodSearchVisitor.visit
(MethodSearchVisitor.java:156)

Fixed in MethodSearchVisitor. Problem was methods with the same name and 
different number of args.
